name: MTLTessellationControlPointIndexType
desc: Options for specifying the size of the control point indices in a control point index buffer.

items.name: case none
items.desc: No size. This value should only be used when drawing patches without a control point index buffer.

items.name: case uint16
items.desc: The size of a 16-bit unsigned integer.

items.name: case uint32
items.desc: The size of a 32-bit unsigned integer.
